facts.fact_text: Lithuania's trade deficit narrowed to EUR 0.506 billion in December 2025 from EUR 0.632 billion in December 2024.

evidences.evidence_text: Lithuania’s trade deficit narrowed to EUR 0.506 billion in December 2025 from EUR 0.632 billion in December 2024

facts.fact_text: Exports surged 8% year-on-year to EUR 2.856 billion.

facts.fact_text: Imports also rose by 2.6% year-on-year to EUR 3.361 billion.

facts.fact_text: For full-year 2025, the country’s trade deficit widened to EUR 6.525 billion from EUR 4.598 billion.
